scripts.db:verify-rls: npx supabase db execute "SELECT schemaname, tablename, COUNT(*) as policy_count FROM pg_policies GROUP BY schemaname, tablename ORDER BY schemaname, tablename;" --db-url postgresql://postgres:postgres@127.0.0.1:54322/postgres
scripts.db:gen-types: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > src/types/supabase.ts
